Sep 27Remember that the http://pool.pm #Cardano logo is actually an epoch clock (epoch = 5 days = 120 hours)

Each dot represents 5 hours.

This allows to know when an epoch is ending, when rewards are available, or for SPOs, when leader logs can be calculated.
